scripts.watch: mkdir -p ./cert ; echo "$TLS__INTERNAL__CRT" > ./cert/cert.pem & echo "$TLS__INTERNAL__KEY" > ./cert/key.pem & EDGE_RUNTIME_TLS=33000 npx nodemon --watch core -e ts --exec ./trex start --key ./cert/key.pem --cert ./cert/cert.pem --main-service ./core/server --event-worker ./core/event --inspect
